Spacing

Update your layout without creating new classes. Spacing helpers are useful for modifying the padding and margin of an element.

Type

  • m - to set margin
  • p - to set padding

Direction

  • t - to set top
  • r - to set right
  • b - to set bottom
  • l - to set left
  • x - to set x-axis
  • y - to set y-axis
  • a - to set all

Size

  • 0 - removes margin or padding for specified direction
  • 1 - applies margin or padding with 16px * 0.25
  • 2 - applies margin or padding with 16px * 0.5
  • 3 - applies margin or padding with 16px * 0.75
  • 4 - applies margin or padding with 16px * 1
  • 5 - applies margin or padding with 16px * 1.25
  • 6 - applies margin or padding with 16px * 1.5
  • 7 - applies margin or padding with 16px * 1.75
  • 8 - applies margin or padding with 16px * 2
  • 9 - applies margin or padding with 16px * 2.25
  • 10 - applies margin or padding with 16px * 2.5

Usage



<p class="mt-1">...</p>

<li class="pb-2">...</li>
